    • registerUnderwriter

      public int registerUnderwriter(String name, LocalDate dob, LocalDate joiningDate, String password)
      Registers a new underwriter with the given details.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the underwriter.
      dob - the date of birth of the underwriter.
      joiningDate - the joining date of the underwriter.
      password - the password for the underwriter.
      Returns:
      the ID of the newly registered underwriter.

    • searchUnderwriter

      public Underwriter searchUnderwriter(int underwriterId)
      Searches for an underwriter by their ID.
      Parameters:
      underwriterId - the ID of the underwriter to search for.
      Returns:
      the Underwriter object if found, null otherwise.

    • deleteUnderwriter

      public boolean deleteUnderwriter(int underwriterId)
      Deletes an underwriter by their ID.
      Parameters:
      underwriterId - the ID of the underwriter to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the underwriter was successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • updateUnderwriterPassword

      public int updateUnderwriterPassword(int underwriterID, String newPassword)
      Updates the password of an underwriter.
      Parameters:
      underwriterID - the ID of the underwriter whose password is to be updated.
      newPassword - the new password to set.
      Returns:
      an integer indicating the result of the update operation.

    • viewAllUnderwriters

      public List<Underwriter> viewAllUnderwriters()
      Retrieves a list of all underwriters with their details.
      Returns:
      a list of Underwriter objects representing all underwriters.

    • viewVehicledByUnderwriterId

      public List<Policy> viewVehicledByUnderwriterId(int underwriterID)
      Retrieves a list of all vehicles registered by a specific underwriter.
      Parameters:
      underwriterID - the ID of the underwriter whose registered vehicles are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      a list of Policy objects representing the vehicles.
